translation.text:
Trains are not running between Newcastle - Maitland - Telarah in both directions due to flooding at Sandgate. We have arranged replacement buses between Newcastle - Maitland - Telarah. Trains continue to run between Maitland & Scone and Maitland & Dungog in both directions. 

We will update you when we have information about when the line will reopen. 

Please allow plenty of extra travel time and check Transport Apps for service updates.
For your safety please avoid rushing during wet weather and take extra care when moving about the station and when getting on and off the train.
If you are sitting for an HSC exam, please plan ahead and allow sufficient travel time. During any service disruptions please make yourself known to staff on the station or train for assistance.
North Sydney due to track equipment repairs at St Marys earlier.

Maitland Trains are not running between Newcastle - Maitland - Telarah in both directions due to flooding at Sandgate. We have arranged replacement buses between Newcastle - Maitland - Telarah. Trains continue to operate between Maitland & Scone and between Maitland & Dungog in both directions. 

Please delay any non-essential travel, use local buses where possible or make alternative arrangements to complete your  journey.

Maitland Trains are not running between Newcastle - Maitland - Telarah in both directions due to flooding at Sandgate. We have arranged replacement buses between Newcastle - Maitland - Telarah. Trains continue to operate between Maitland & Scone and between Maitland & Dungog in both directions. 

Please delay any non-essential travel, use local buses where possible or make alternative arrangements to complete your  journey.
North Sydney due to track equipment repairs at St Marys earlier.
due to an issue with a freight train earlier. Allow up to 10 minutes extra travel time.
due to track equipment repairs at St Marys earlier.
due to an operational issue at Hornsby earlier. Please allow additional travel time.

Trains are not running between Newcastle - Maitland - Telarah in both directions due to flooding at Sandgate. We have arranged replacement buses between Newcastle - Maitland - Telarah. Trains continue to operate between Maitland & Scone and between Maitland & Dungog in both directions. 

Please delay any non-essential travel, use local buses where possible or make alternative arrangements to complete your  journey.
The 6th carriage is locked due to a train requiring mechanical repairs earlier. Please use the next carriage to board this train.
The 3rd carriage is locked due to a train requiring mechanical repairs earlier. Please use the next carriage to board this train.

From Sunday 17 October until Monday 20 December the lift from the concourse to platform 1 will be closed due to an upgrade. If you need lift access, catch a train from platform 3/4 for Metro access to North Shore stations or via Strathfield to the City. For help see stations staff or call 98478248.

The lift between the concourse and platform 5 is out of service until 22 November due to upgrade works.  For customers travelling to Ashfield from the city requiring lift, you may have to change at Burwood and catch a return service to Ashfield to complete your journey. If you require further assistance, please ask staff or phone 9752 8356.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 1/2 is out of service until 7 December due to upgrade works. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9752 8356.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 1 & 2 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 9848 9388.

The lift between the concourse and platform 1 will be out of service until the 15 December. If you require a lift you may need to travel to Hurstville for a return service to City. For assistance, please ask staff or call 9563 7273.

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6063489

Access to the lift on Platform 2 at Campsie has temporarily changed due to Metro works.
Please take care when going to and from the lift on the platform.
Due to station redevelopment work some platforms have reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platform

There is no toilet access at Canterbury station until 6 December due to construction works.
Please use public toilets located outside the station.

The stairs from Richardsons Crescent to concourse are closed for maintenance work until November 2021. Access to platforms 2 and 3 is via platform 1 side entrance (off carpark on Richardsons Crescent). Entrance from Griffiths St is not affected.
There is no toilet access at Belmore station until 15 December due to construction works.

A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. 
While the concourse is being installed, please use the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. 
If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info

From Monday 15 November to Wednesday 24 November, the lift from Walker Street into Rhodes Station will be closed for an upgrade. 
Lift access will be available from Blaxland Road into Rhodes Station. 
For help, please see the baggage handlers, speak with station staff or call  9752 8467.

Until mid December 2021, the escalators to Exit 1 (Wynyard Park) will undergo upgrade works. Please follow the signs and staff directions to the nearest available stairs or lift. If you need assistance, see station staff.
